titleStmt.title: Some sober inspections made into carriage and consults of the late Long-Parliament whereby occasion is taken to speak of parliaments in former times, and of Magna Charta, with some reflexes upon government in general.
Som sober inspections made into the cariage and consults of the late Long Parlement
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

notesStmt.note: Later published under the title: Philanglvs.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
